actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-813.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 286 - 7 (Record Vote No: 243).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3678) to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources and the improvement and rehabilitation of the Nation's water resources infrastructure.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3678 (water resources development).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3678) to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources and the improvement and rehabilitation of the Nation's water resources infrastructure.
